articles.title: Apple Vision Pro Has Likely Been Removed From The Production Line, As A Previous Report Claimed That No More Units Will Be Made By The End Of 2024 - Wccftech
articles.description: The overly priced $3,499 Apple Vision Pro has most probably witnessed the end of its life, as no more units were scheduled to be mass produced by the end of 2024
articles.content: A multitude of decisions were taken when proceeding with the Apple Vision Pro launch in February earlier this year. However, with internal data revealing that less than 500,000 units were shipped eve… [+2608 chars]
